summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Portal Dosare search improvements. Backend API and frontend UI successfully implement the new search functionality with one row per case, proper column structure, and correct behavior for case number vs party name searches.

minor_issues.issue: Party name search occasionally times out after 30 seconds
minor_issues.impact: User experience delay for party name searches
minor_issues.workaround: Increase timeout or add loading indicators

minor_issues.issue: Search button becomes disabled during loading states, preventing rapid consecutive searches

passed_tests: Table structure with 12 columns including Observații
Case number search returns empty Nume/Calitate fields
No results correctly shows 'Niciun rezultat găsit' in Observații
One row per case (not per party)
Frontend table displays compactly without horizontal scroll
UI navigation and theme toggle functionality
Export buttons (Excel, CSV, TXT) are present and functional

success_percentage.backend: 85.7% (6/7 tests passed - 1 timeout on party name search)
